Package index

Standardize Datasets for ‘Riskintro’ Analysis

Objects exported from other packages

Calculate risks

These functions are to be used for calculations of risks of introduction

calc_animal_mobility_flows_risk()
Animal mobility destination point risk
calc_animal_mobility_intro_risk()
Animal mobility risk for each epidemiological unit (EU)
calc_animal_mobility_risk()
Calculate animal mobility risk
calc_border_lengths()
Get Shared Borders Between EUs and Bordering Countries
calc_border_risk()
Calculate weighted border risk
calc_emission_risk()
Build the weighted emission risk table
calc_entry_point_risk()
Calculate entry point risk
calc_road_access_risk()
Road access introduction risk analysis
augment_epi_units_with_raster()
Aggregate raster values over polygon areas
rescale_risk_scores()
Scaling range transformation function (re-scaling)
summarise_risk_scores()
Summarise risk score

Utilities

extract_point_risk() extract_flow_risk() extract_raster() extract_border()
Extract analysis subcomponents
updateRoadAccessLeaflet()
Plot risk access

Risk table building

risk_table()
Initialise table of risks
add_risk()
Add risk to risk table
remove_risk()
Remove risk from risk table

On this page

This R package was developed by Ardata for CIRAD to provide a tool for analysing geospatial epidemiological.
